casebody.data:
EDWARDS, et al.
v.
FOLEY, et al. 200P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 20, 2017 Walter L. Tippett, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kimberly M. Marston, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Foley, Clyde M., et al. Michael Kaeding, Attorney at Law, Durham, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Edward J. Coyne, III, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Bryan M. Knight, Attorney at Law, for Edwards, Barry D., et al.

*419The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of June 2017 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of June 2017."
